<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.70</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Inventory </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Collects all loaded [[magazines]] from all [[primaryWeapon]] muzzles and returns them in [[Array]], otherwise it returns []. This command is used for infantry weapons only. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''primaryWeaponMagazine''' unit </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>


</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 


</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[hint]] [[str]] [[primaryWeaponMagazine]] [[player]]; //["30Rnd_65x39_caseless_mag"]
</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_array <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> [[primaryWeaponMagazine]] [[player]];
[[if]] ([[count]] _array > 0) [[then]] {
	[[hint]] ("Primary weapon is loaded with " + (_array [[select]] 0) + "!");
} [[else]] {
	[[if]] ([[primaryWeapon]] [[player]] != "") [[then]] {
		[[hint]] "Primary weapon is not loaded!";
	} [[else]] {
		[[hint]] "Player doesn't have a primary weapon!";
	};
};
</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value> 

____________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value>  [[primaryWeapon]], [[primaryWeaponItems]], [[addPrimaryWeaponItem]], [[removePrimaryWeaponItem]], [[removeAllPrimaryWeaponItems]], [[handgunMagazine]], [[secondaryWeaponMagazine]], [[binocularMagazine]]  </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="7"/><value>  </value></part><part><name>MPBEHAVIOUR</name>=<value>

[[Category:Arma_3:_New_Scripting_Commands_List|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]

[[Category:Scripting Commands Arma 3|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]

<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on June 8, 2014 - 21:52 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Pierre MGI|Pierre MGI]]</dt>
<dd class="note">

This function returns an array like ["type of magazine loaded in primary weapon", "type of grenade loaded in launcher if exist"] <br>
For example ["30Rnd_556x45_Stanag", "1Rnd_HE_Grenade_shell"], with no consideration about amount of these ammo.<br>
However, be careful if you intend to use it in expression like : (magazines _unit) - (primaryWeaponMagazine _unit), i.e. magazines "minus" this array,<br>
The result will inventory all magazines (with grenades, chemlights...) except ALL magazines (and grenades eventually) belonging to the TYPE of the loaded one! i.e. you suppress ALL "30Rnd_556x45_Stanag" but the "30Rnd_556x45_Stanag_Tracer_Green" are still remaining.<br>
If you kill the unit, the same expression will return a consistent inventory as primary weapon "disappears" and primaryWeaponMagazine is empty. "30Rnd_556x45_Stanag" are back!

</dd>
</dl>
<comment><!-- DISCONTINUE Notes --></comment></root>
